message: Youshan Zhang is currently an assistant professor in the Computer Science and Artificial Intelligence department at Yeshiva University. He has a background in artificial intelligence, machine learning, computer vision, transfer learning, manifold learning, and shape analysis. Dr. Zhang is enthusiastic about interdisciplinary research and collaborating with researchers from related fields. He is seeking highly self-motivated Ph.D. students with a Math CS background. His email address is youshan.zhang@yu.edu. Previously, Dr. Zhang was a Postdoc at Cornell University.
